mapper.update:
update mkt_cam_chl_result set
MKT_CAM_CHL_RESULT_NAME = #{mktCamChlResultName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESULT = #{result,jdbcType=BIGINT},
REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where MKT_CAM_CHL_RESULT_ID = #{mktCamChlResultId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select MKT_CAM_CHL_RESULT_ID, MKT_CAM_CHL_RESULT_NAME, RESULT, REASON, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from mkt_cam_chl_result where MKT_CAM_CHL_RESULT_ID = #{mktCamChlResultId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
